CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 13, 1958, pg. 10A, reads: Shower for Bride-Elect - Saturday's bride, Miss Barbara Peace, who will be married to the noted ex-Pitt athlete, Arnie Sowell in Heinz Chapel, Sept. 13, has been the center of much pre-marriage attention by her friends. On the social agenda have been a "P. J." party, a cocktail fete, a rehearsal dinner and a luncheon.  Above is a group of friends who showered her at the home of Lee Brun [LeeBrun] Johnson on Kelly St.  Among these charming young ladies are Joan Bolden, Otella Twiman [Twyman], Carrie Harley [Warley], Carrie Clanton, Evelyn Johnson, Justine Robinson, Harriet Reed, Doris Finney, Edyth Schrader, Myrna Davis, Vernicia Mitchell, Naomi Thomas, Geraldine Reynolds, Mildred Wallace, Cecelia Trower, Edith Venable and Patty Curry.  Miss Peace has also been showered by co-workers at Family and Children's Service Agency. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Guests at wedding shower for Barbara Peace and Arnie Sowell, seated from left: two unknowns, Harriet Reid, unknown, Carrie Clanton, Justine Robinson; standing: Carmenita Austin, Edyth or Edythe Schraeder, Edith Venable, Myrna Davis, LeeBrun Johnson, Barbara Peace, Carrie Warley, possibly Otella Johnson Twyman, Joan Bolden, unknown, Evelyn Johnson, and Geraldine Reynolds (unknowns are possibly Doris Finney, Vernicia Mitchell, Naomi Thomas, Mildred Wallace, or Patty Curry) posed around table with gifts and umbrella decoration, in home of LeeBrun Johnson, Kelly Street
